T02D1210:311b-0: @311b * // dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bshad pa bzhugs /
T02D1210:311b-2: # // dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'i mtshan nyid ni nyi
T02D1210:311b-3: ma phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs lnga stong dang bzhi
T02D1210:311b-4: brgya'o // de ltar grangs bgrangs pas nyin dang mtshan
T02D1210:311b-5: mo stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang lhag pa
T02D1210:311b-6: brgya'o // brgya ste / ji ltar grangs kyis bgrangs pa shes par bya'o //
T02D1210:311b-7: chu tshod gcig la dbugs sum brgya dang drug cu'o //
T02D1210:311b-8: dbyi gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'i mtshan nyid brjod do //
T02D1210:311b-9: chu tshod ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo bcu drug dang /
T02D1210:311b-10: de nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa bzhi ste /
T02D1210:311b-11: de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi blang bar bya'o zer /
T02D1210:311b-12: zangs srang bcu gnyis las brdungs pa rgyar sor bcu gnyis kha dang dpangs su sor brgyad pa la /
T02D1210:311b-13: gser man cha gsum las brdungs pa'i mgo mjug mnyam
T02D1210:311b-14: pa sor drug pas phug pa'i bug pa can chu'i
T02D1210:311b-15: kha ru gzhag pa'i bu ga nas byung ba'i chus
T02D1210:311b-16: khengs nas gting du nub pa chu tshod do //
T02D1210:311b-18: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ratna badzra dang /
